trans-unit.source: Represents a scrollable area that can contain other visible elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示可以包含其他可视元素的可滚动区域。

trans-unit.source: A ScrollViewer enables content to be displayed in a smaller area than its actual size.
trans-unit.target: ScrollViewer 使内容能够显示在比其实际大小较小的区域。

trans-unit.source: When the content of the ScrollViewer is not entirely visible, the ScrollViewer displays scrollbars that the user can use to move the content areas that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 不完全可见的 ScrollViewer 内容时，ScrollViewer 显示滚动条显示用户可用于移动的内容区域可见。

trans-unit.source: The area that includes all of the content of the ScrollViewer is the extent.
trans-unit.target: 包括所有的 ScrollViewer 内容的区域是的范围。

trans-unit.source: The visible area of the content is the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 内容的可见区域是视区。

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is used to scroll content by a predetermined physical increment, typically by a value that is declared in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 物理滚动用于滚动内容预先确定的物理增量，通常由声明以像素为单位的值。

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next item in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑滚动用于滚动到的逻辑树中的下一项。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a ScrollViewer and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>中一个 ScrollViewer 和一组元素其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Physical scrolling is the default scroll behavior for most <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> elements.
trans-unit.target: 物理滚动，则大多数默认滚动行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If your ScrollViewer contains a large number of items, the scrolling performance may be affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你 ScrollViewer 包含大量的项，滚动的性能可能会影响。

trans-unit.source: In this case, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>到`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes the content view to remain static while dragging the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and to update only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致的内容视图拖动时保持静态<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>并更新时，才<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>发布。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: Because the scroll bars for a ScrollViewer element are defined in the default style of the element, scroll bars will no longer appear if you apply a custom style to a ScrollViewer.
trans-unit.target: 因为 ScrollViewer 元素的滚动条中的元素的默认样式定义，如果自定义样式应用到 ScrollViewer 将不再显示滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Scroll bars must be defined in the custom style for them to appear.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条必须中使它们出现的自定义样式定义。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ScrollViewer Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ScrollViewer controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ScrollViewer 控件到自定义适用于多个 ScrollViewer 控件，使用的相同的属性设置<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控制。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ScrollViewer, see [ScrollViewer Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于 ScrollViewer 的状态，请参阅[ScrollViewer 样式和模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ScrollViewer control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在 ScrollViewer 控件的默认模板中，通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The final area within the parent that this element should use to arrange itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: 父级中应使用此元素排列自身及其子元素的最终区域。

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 排列的内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether elements that support the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"></xref> interface are allowed to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否支持元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo"></xref>接口允许向下滚动。

trans-unit.source: Content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> can be scrolled in terms of physical units or logical units.
trans-unit.target: 中的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>可滚动根据物理单元或逻辑单元。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Physical units are device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 物理单元是与设备无关的像素。

trans-unit.source: Logical units are used for scrolling items within an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑单元用于滚动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>中的项

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is to use physical units to scroll its content.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>是使用物理单位来向其内容滚动。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: However, in cases where the CanContentScroll is set to `true`, the content could use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 但是，在其中 CanContentScroll 设置为的情况下`true`，内容可以使用逻辑单元以向下滚动。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>, and other controls that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> use logical units to scroll.
trans-unit.target: 例如， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>，和其他控件，继承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>使用逻辑单元以向下滚动。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: If CanContentScroll is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items, instead of physical units.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CanContentScroll`true`的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>属性是数字的项，而不是物理单位。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its CanContentScroll property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并将其 CanContentScroll 属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.target: 物理滚动，则大多数默认滚动行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the horizontal offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，包含滚动内容的水平偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A positive HorizontalOffset value corresponds to the content being offset to the left.
trans-unit.target: 正 HorizontalOffset 值对应于偏移左侧的内容。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介于零和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>减<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The returned value is described in Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值述设备无关的像素。

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, HorizontalOffset continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 版本 3.5 SP1，开始时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>是`true`，HorizontalOffset 继续更改作为用户拖动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，但内容视图不会更改直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>发布。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and HorizontalOffset represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A>表示可见内容的偏移量，HorizontalOffset 表示基于内容的偏移量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentHorizontalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供适当<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>实现此控件，作为的一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]自动化基础结构。

trans-unit.source: The appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control.
trans-unit.target: 相应<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>对于此控件的实现。

trans-unit.source: Responds to specific keyboard input and invokes associated scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 响应特定的键盘输入，并调用相关联的滚动行为。

trans-unit.source: The following keyboard input is recognized: - The LEFT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the left.
trans-unit.target: 以下键盘输入识别:-向左箭头键︰ 内容滚动左侧的一行。

trans-unit.source: - The RIGHT ARROW key: Scrolls content one line to the right.
trans-unit.target: -向右箭头键︰ 内容滚动到右侧的一行。

trans-unit.source: - The UP ARROW key: Scrolls content upward by one line.
trans-unit.target: -向上箭头键︰ 向上滚动一行的内容。

trans-unit.source: - The DOWN ARROW key: Scrolls content downward by one line.
trans-unit.target: -向下箭头键︰ 将内容向下滚动一行。

trans-unit.source: - PAGE UP: Scrolls content to the top of the current page.
trans-unit.target: -PAGE UP︰ 滚动到当前页的顶部的内容。

trans-unit.source: - PAGE DOWN: Scrolls content to the bottom of the current page.
trans-unit.target: -PAGE DOWN︰ 滚动到当前页的底部的内容。

trans-unit.source: - HOME: Scrolls content to the top of the first page.
trans-unit.target: -主页︰ 滚动内容的第一页的顶部。

trans-unit.source: - END: Scrolls content to the bottom of the last page.
trans-unit.target: -结束︰ 滚动到底部的最后一页的内容。

trans-unit.source: Called when a change in scrolling state is detected, such as a change in scroll position, extent, or viewport size.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到滚动状态更改，例如，在滚动位置、 范围或视区大小发生更改时调用。

trans-unit.source: If you override this method, call `base.OnScrollChanged(ScrollChangedEventArgs)` to ensure that this event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写此方法，调用`base.OnScrollChanged(ScrollChangedEventArgs)`以确保将引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contain information about the change in the scrolling state.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含有关滚动状态中的更改的信息。

trans-unit.source: Called when a tap gesture initiated by a stylus is detected.
trans-unit.target: 当检测到由触笔启动的点击动作时调用。

trans-unit.source: Used internally to make decisions about panning.
trans-unit.target: 在内部用于判断平移。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusSystemGestureEventArgs"> </xref>包含有关该笔势的信息。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> content downward by one page.
trans-unit.target: 滚动<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>内容向下一页。

trans-unit.source: This method does not induce any scrolling behavior if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法不会导致任何滚动行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>是`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Logical scrolling is used to scroll to the next element in the logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 逻辑滚动用于滚动的逻辑树中的下一个元素。

trans-unit.source: This differs from physical scrolling, which scrolls content by a defined physical increment in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: 这不同于物理滚动，按照指定方向在一个定义物理增量来滚动内容。

trans-unit.source: If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the host <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装主机<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>中的元素<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per squared millisecond when in inertia.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置率<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>减慢[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]/ 在惯性平方毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: When a user scrolls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> by using touch, the user puts a finger on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>, moves the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then lifts the finger while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: 当用户滚动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>通过使用触摸，用户还将的手指放<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>，移到近距离的屏幕上方的手指，然后作为时它上方的手指是移动。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The result of this is that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will continue to move after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: 此操作的结果是，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>移动用户抬起手指后将继续。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The PanningDeceleration property specifies the rate the scrolling slows after the user lifts the finger.
trans-unit.target: PanningDeceleration 属性指定滚动减慢用户抬起手指后的速率。

trans-unit.source: The rate <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> slows in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per squared millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 速率<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>减慢[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]/ 平方毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningDeceleration*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the way <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的方式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>响应触摸操作。

trans-unit.source: ThePanningMode property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scroll horizontally, vertically, or both.
trans-unit.target: ThePanningMode 属性指定是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>滚动水平、 垂直方向和/或文件名。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>当用户将为指的触摸设备上支持 Windows 触摸屏上的控件上时，将滚动。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: PanningMode can be either set directly on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> or used as an attached property.
trans-unit.target: PanningMode 可以是直接基于设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>或用作附加属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When a control contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, use PanningMode as an attached property to specify the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 当控件包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>在其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请使用为附加属性指定的行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> PanningMode</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> outside of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, set PanningMode directly on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>之外<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，设置是直接对<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> PanningMode</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>响应触摸操作。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.PanningMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置滚动偏移量转换操作偏移的比例。

trans-unit.source: When a user drags a finger across an object, it is considered a translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 当用户在对象上拖动手指时，认为它是一个转换操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> uses that manipulation to scroll.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>使用此操作向下滚动。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The PanningRatio property specifies how much the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scrolls for each unit of translation.
trans-unit.target: PanningRatio 属性指定多少<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>滚动为每个翻译单元。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: For example, if PanningRatio is 2, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll 2 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for every [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] of the translate manipulation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 PanningRatio 为 2，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>将滚动 2[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]为每个[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]的转换操作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The ratio of scrolling offset to translate manipulation offset.
trans-unit.target: 滚动偏移量转换操作偏移的比例。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningRatio*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the vertical size of the content element that can be scrolled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，表示可滚动的内容元素的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, ScrollableHeight, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`true`的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>，ScrollableHeight， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>属性是数字的项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`false`，这些属性的值是设备无关的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Displaying a large number of items may cause performance issues.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that contains the vertical offset of the scrolled content.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，包含滚动内容的垂直偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A positive VerticalOffset value corresponds to the content being offset to the top.
trans-unit.target: 正 VerticalOffset 值对应于页首偏移的内容。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are between zero and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> minus the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有效值介于零和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>减<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>, and VerticalOffset properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`true`的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>，而 VerticalOffset 属性都是数字的项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`false`，这些属性的值是设备无关的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Beginning in the .NET Framework version 3.5 SP1, when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A> is `true`, VerticalOffset continues to change as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, but the content view doesn't change until the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> is released.
trans-unit.target: 从.NET Framework 版本 3.5 SP1，开始时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>是`true`，VerticalOffset 继续更改作为用户拖动<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>，但内容视图不会更改直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>发布。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.IsDeferredScrollingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: In this case, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A> represents the visible content offset and VerticalOffset represents the content offset based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> position.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>表示可见内容的偏移量，VerticalOffset 表示基于内容的偏移量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>位置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ContentVerticalOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: ViewportHeight is only an output property; it can effectively be set by specifying the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> of the content element.
trans-unit.target: ViewportHeight 是仅一个输出属性;它可以有效地设置通过指定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>内容元素。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `true`, the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>, ViewportHeight, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> properties are number of items.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`true`的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A>，ViewportHeight，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>属性是数字的项。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ScrollableHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A> is `false`, the values of these properties are Device Independent Pixels.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>是`false`，这些属性的值是设备无关的像素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.CanContentScroll%2A>
